title: Fitness Center, Swimming Pool, Cherry Creek Schools *$500 OFF AVA AUG*
posting_body: ['9959 E Peakview Ave, Englewood, CO 80111', 'Avery Park Apartments in Englewood, CO 80111 is a beautiful community located 25 minutes from downtown Denver and less than 5 minutes from I-25.', 'Our lovely apartment homes come equipped with washers and dryers, private patios or balconies, kitchens with pantries, wood burning fireplaces, large closet space and wood style floors in select homes.', 'Avery Park is a pet friendly community featuring a 24 hour fitness center, swimming pool, playground, barbecue picnic area, on-site recycling and complimentary coffee.', 'We are located near the Denver Tech Center, less than 10 minutes from Park Meadows Mall and less than five miles from C-470 and I-225.', 'Avery Park promotes healthy living by offering a smoke free environment.', 'Apartment Features:', 'Cable Ready', 'Pool Views', 'Microwave', 'Vinyl Wood Plank Flooring', 'Patio/Balcony', 'Window Coverings', 'Washer/Dryer', 'Fireplace', 'Fully Equipped Kitchens', 'Ceiling Fan', 'Community Features:', 'Located in the Cherry Creek School District', 'Off Street Parking', 'BBQ/Picnic Area', 'Clubhouse', 'On-Site Management', 'Playground', 'Smoke Free Community', 'Outdoor Multi-Sport Court', 'Yoga Room', 'Fitness Center', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
